title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form 3-10 - Application to restore to calendar
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form 3-10 - Application to restore to calendar

State Regulations

Sec. 315.3 F.C.A. Form 3-10
(Juvenile Delinquency)
7/83
FAMILY COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF
________
________
In the Matter of Docket No. ________
________ APPLICATION TO
RESTORE TO CALENDAR
A Person Alleged to be a

Juvenile Delinquent, ________ Respondent. ________
TO THE FAMILY COURT: The undersigned presentment agency
respectfully alleges that: 1. It is the presentment agency and that
________ is the Respondent in the above-entitled proceeding. 2. On ________, 19 ________, an order in
the above-entitled proceeding was entered whereby said proceeding was adjourned
in contemplation of dismissal in furtherance of justice until ________ upon the
following terms and conditions: A copy of said order is annexed as Exhibit
A. 3. (Upon information and belief,)

Respondent has not abided by said terms and conditions in that: ____________
____________
4. No previous application has been made
to any court or judge for the relief requested herein (except ________.)
WHEREFORE, the undersigned requests that
this matter be restored to the calendar of the Family Court of ________ County
for further order of the Court. ______________
Authorized Presentment Agency

By ____________
______________
Title
VERIFICATION
(Agency)
STATE OF NEW YORK)
) ss.: COUNTY OF
________)
________, being duly sworn, deposes and
says: That (s)he is the ________ of ________, an
agency authorized to originate the above-entitled proceeding, and is acquainted
with the facts and circumstances therein; that (s)he has read the foregoing and
knows the contents thereof; that the same is true to (his) (her) own knowledge, except as to matters therein stated to be alleged on information and belief and
as to those matters (s)he believes it to be true. ______________
Name
______________
Title

Sworn to before me this
________ day of ________, 19
________. ______________
(Notary Public)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Juvenile Delinquency

Forms (Family Court Act Article 3), form
3-10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
